org.antlr.intellij.adaptor.lexer

Class SimpleAntlrAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.lexer.Lexer
      • com.intellij.lexer.LexerBase
        • org.antlr.intellij.adaptor.lexer.AntlrLexerAdapter<AntlrLexerState>
          • org.antlr.intellij.adaptor.lexer.SimpleAntlrAdapter

  • public class SimpleAntlrAdapter
extends AntlrLexerAdapter<AntlrLexerState>
    This default implementation of AntlrLexerAdapter supports any ANTLR 4 lexer that does not store extra information for use in custom actions. The state is maintained in AntlrLexerState which supports single- as well as multi-mode lexers.
